org.forgerock.openam.sts.soap

Class TokenSpecification

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.sts.soap.TokenSpecification

  • public class TokenSpecification
extends Object
    This class provides means to create TokenSpecification instances which encapsulate the state necessary to issue tokens of various types, currently limited to SAML2 Bearer, HolderOfKey, and SenderVouches assertions. This state is referenced by the SoapSTSConsumer to set the appropriate state in the STSClient so that RequestSecurityToken requests can be generated for specific token types. Ultimately, the token-type desired in a RST is a combination of the TokenType and KeyType strings, though if a SAML2 SenderVouches assertion is desired, the ActAs or OnBehalfOf element must also be set.

      • saml2Bearer

        public static TokenSpecification saml2Bearer()
        Returns:
        A TokenSpecification instance with the state necessary to generate a SAML2 bearer assertion

      • usernameTokenSaml2SenderVouches

        public static TokenSpecification usernameTokenSaml2SenderVouches(String username,
                                                                 String password)
        Parameters:
        username - the username in the UsernameToken included as the OnBehalfOf element
        password - the password in the UsernameToken included as the OnBehalfOf element
        Returns:
        A TokenSpecification instance with the state necessary to generate a SAML2 assertion with SenderVouches subject confirmation. The OnBehalfOf element in this TokenSpecification will be a UsernameToken.

      • openAMSessionTokenSaml2SenderVouches

        public static TokenSpecification openAMSessionTokenSaml2SenderVouches(String sessionId)
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the OpenAM session id which will be used as the value in the OpenAMSessionToken element
        Returns:
        A TokenSpecification instance with the state necessary to generate a SAML2 assertion with SenderVouches subject confirmation. The OnBehalfOf element in this TokenSpecification will be a OpenAMSessionToken.

      • saml2HolderOfKey

        public static TokenSpecification saml2HolderOfKey(X509Certificate x509Certificate)
        Parameters:
        x509Certificate - The sts client's x509-certificate to be included in the SAML2 HoK certificate to provide proof of assertion ownership
        Returns:
        A TokenSpecification instance with the state necessary to generate a SAML2 assertion with HolderOfKey subject confirmation.

      • openIdConnectToken

        public static TokenSpecification openIdConnectToken()
        Returns:
        A TokenSpecification instance which will result in the STS generating an OpenIdConnect token.

      • openIdConnectTokenUsernameTokenDelegation

        public static TokenSpecification openIdConnectTokenUsernameTokenDelegation(String username,
                                                                           String password)
        Returns:
        A TokenSpecification instance which will result in the STS generating an OpenIdConnect token. The subject asserted by this token will correspond to the {username, password} credentials.

      • openIdConnectTokenOpenAMSessionTokenDelegation

        public static TokenSpecification openIdConnectTokenOpenAMSessionTokenDelegation(String sessionId)
        Returns:
        A TokenSpecification instance which will result in the STS generating an OpenIdConnect token. The subject asserted by this token will correspond to the principal associated with the OpenAM session id.

      • usernameTokenOnBehalfOfElement

        public static Element usernameTokenOnBehalfOfElement(String username,
                                                     String password)
        Parameters:
        username - the UsernameToken username
        password - the UsernameToken password
        Returns:
        A UsernameToken element to be used as the OnBehalfOf Element in a RequestSecurityToken defining the ISSUE operation invocation.

      • openAMSessionTokenOnBehalfOfElement

        public static Element openAMSessionTokenOnBehalfOfElement(String sessionId)
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the OpenAM session id to be used as the content of the BinarySecurityToken containing the OpenAMSessionToken assertion
        Returns:
        The element corresponding to a OpenAMSessionToken assertion to be used as the OnBehalfOf Element in the RequestSecurityToken defining the ISSUE operation invocation.
